name: Kids VS Zombies: Brawl for Donuts
name_original: Kids VS Zombies: Brawl for Donuts
description:
Kids vs Zombies is a MOBA game that is all about fun, action, and tactics. Just as in all PVP games, you engage with other brawlers and play tricks on them to get precious donuts and win zombie games. Shooting and traps, monsters and cool weapons, mysterious location, and backpacks full of surprises. These zombie killing games will make you come back for more!

GET AND UPGRADE YOUR ZOMBIE SHOOTING EQUIPMENT

Gain experience for fighting with zombies and unlock useful abilities, awesome weapons like a frag and bullet shooter, and cool backpacks. Kill more monsters and get the most powerful zombie shooter to survive all apocalypse games!

CHOOSE YOUR RPG PLAYSTYLE

Do you have what it takes to defeat all brawlers? Create your own set of skills, get a perfect zombie shooter and backpack. Find your unique playstyle to dominate the battle royale field!

PLAY DIRTY TRICKS ON YOUR OPPONENTS

You can only kill zombies, yet you can brawl against other survivors too. Wanna be the best in zombie shooting games and get all donuts? Set traps for your opponents — let the zombies do the dirty work for you!

DEADLY ZOMBIES WITH UNIQUE SKILLS

Every zombie has its own abilities and each is equally dangerous! However, the right RPG strategy will help you to get rid of all of them and win these crazy zombie games!

REAL-TIME BATTLE ROYALE GAMES

It’s the apocalypse, it’s now, it’s real! Get a powerful bullet shooter or a frag, and be ready to face monsters and enemies on the battlefield. Shoot, kill zombies, level up your weapon, brawl for donuts, frame other players — do everything to survive! Battle with your frienemies in real-time mode & find out who's the smartest.

WIN HUNGRY DONUT GAMES

Zombie survival games are indeed hungry RPG games :) To get through the apocalypse you need donuts. Grab when you see them and shoot zombies to get super-donuts and upgrade your weapons.

Dive into the world of fun zombie shooting games! Start a battle royale, have fun, and stay hungry for donuts. Fight all monsters and become the number one zombie killer in the apocalypse world.
